text: pachi jyare allaha temane bacavi le che to tarata ja te'o dharati para ayogya rite vidroha karava lage che. He loko! A tamaro vidroha tamara mate apattinum karana banase, duniyana jivanana (thodanka) phayada'o che, pachi tamare amari tarapha pacha pharavanum che, pachi ame tamara badha karyo batavi da'isum
